codonopt 0.1.1

    Sampling ORFs of neonGreen

    Codon Stability Coefficients

    csc_default.Rd

    Codon stability coefficients (CSCs) objects.

    Usage

    csc_default()

csc_hela_endo()

csc_k562_orfome()

csc_k562_slam()

csc_rpe_endo()

csc_x293t_endo()

csc_x293t_orfome()

    Value

    A named numeric vector.

    names

    Codons (DNA triplets)

    values

    CSCs for K562_ORFome

    Examples

    csc_default()
#>         AAA         AAC         AAG         AAT         ACA         ACC 
#> -0.07906900 -0.01422550  0.09540522 -0.06440400 -0.02791650  0.04424593 
#>         ACG         ACT         AGA         AGC         AGG         AGT

#>         ATA         ATC         ATG         ATT         CAA         CAC

#>         CAG         CAT         CCA         CCC         CCG         CCT 
#> -0.01742640 -0.15979520 -0.05000270 -0.03780900 -0.04526170 -0.06096270
